name: Night Stories
description:
After the great war, all people lose their families. Now, they are lose their motivation to live. Everyday, they go to the tavern to run from their problems. As the tavern owner, it's your job to recover their motivation to live.

Controls :
Mouse/Arrows : Menu Navigation
Enter/Left Click : Confirm

by :

- Finiko Kasula Novenda
- Yasmine Febrina Chairunnisa
- Muhammad Sulthan Adhipradana
